Research

Welcome to the BEAR Lab at the Department of Computer Science, University of Rochester .

We focuse on understanding, predicting and enhancing user behavior in Mixed Reality (MR) interaction. We capture the userâ€™s behavioral and perceptual patterns with computational methods; develop input techniques and adaptive user interfaces to facilitate human-computer two-way communication; explore unique behavioral enhancements enabled by MR.

BEAR lab is headed by Prof. Yukang Yan. If you want to work with us, please check out our Team page.
